column2:
From 1 to 5, how do you feel after seeing trash in the forest?
(1 = very upset, 5 = very happy)
column3:
How do you rate the trash situation in the forest today? 
(1 = very bad, 5 = very good)
column4: In general, where do you most often see trash in the forest?
column5: Did you see any trash in the forest today?
column6: Where did you see trash in the forest today?
column7: What types of trash did you see today?
column8: How many days per week do you visit the forest?
column9: In general, what activities do you do in the forest?
column10: What activities did you do today?
column11:
Which 2 activities do you think create the most waste in the forest?
Select up to 2.
column12:
From 1 to 5, how important are sports in the forest to you?
(1 = not important, 5 = very important)
column13:
In the forest, how often do you see trash (like wrappers or bottles) that seems to come from sports activities?
(1 = never, 5 = all the time)
column14: Do you think sportspeople litter more than other forest users?
column15: Do you think that big forest-sports events general create more waste in the forest? (Like races or bike tours)
column16:
In your opinion, what are the best measures against littering in the forest?
Select up to 2
column17:
Who should be responsible to remove trash from the forest? 
Pick the best answer.
column18:
On how many days per year should authorities remove trash from the forest?
(From 0 to 365)
column19: What is your age in years?
